Please join here to help create a community that is a discussion of what happens here at textadventures.  Discord is a messaging site that can allow many different branches of chats, I have taken the liberty of making a server.

Here's the link: https://discord.gg/84PnJS

Posts.EditableText:
BTW, you can set links to never expire. You should repost the link with a "never expire" check on it. 

Anonynn.
